channel.title: Stream isolation on custom workstation
channel.description:
I am trying to get stream isolation in my custom debian jessie workstation. The best i found was https://github.com/Whonix/uwt#how-to-install-in-debian-using-apt-get
But after updating repository i get "unable to locate package uwt". Is this instruction too old?

item.title: Stream isolation on custom workstation
item.dc:creator: ReekYoung
item.description:
So far I have tested ssh and apt-get with uwt, it is working with transport and dnsport disabled on the gateway.

Read full topic

item.title: Stream isolation on custom workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Readme updated.

Will be interesting to see if uwt works for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Stream isolation on custom workstation
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Yes, that is an old repository.

See: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-APT-Repository#Repository_Location_URI

Use: deb http://deb.whonix.org/ jessie main or https or onion.

Read full topic
